termsContent:
1. In order to get the bonus, you must place a deposit of at least 1 mBTC or the same value in cryptocurrencies.
2. The maximum bonus amount is 50% of the deposit amount, but not more than 1000 mBTC or the same value in other cryptocurrencies.
3. Full wagering requires making bets 40 times the amount of the bonus received: (deposit + bonus) × 40.
4. The deposit bonus is valid for 5 days, starting from the date you receive it.
5. The maximum bet amount when wagering is 0.3 mBTC or the same value in other cryptocurrencies.
6. 25 Free Spins will be given per day within two days of the day you activated the bonus.
7. General bonus terms and conditions apply.
subtitle: Take your 50% bonus up to 1000 mBTC and 50 FS
title: 3rd deposit bonus
description:
Grab your chance to play on at Slotsbet with a head start, thanks to our third deposit bonus!

**How to get the bonus:**

1. Place a deposit onto your account with at least 1 mBTC. 
2. Instantly receive a 50% bonus of up to 1000 mBTC.
3. Collect your 50 Free Spins that you can find in the Bonus section of your account.
